vocabulary.meaning: Any program designed to perform a specific function directly for the user.
An icon or figure that represents a person in video games, chat rooms and on Internet forums.
A defect or fault in a program that prevents it from working correctly.
A sort of fast memory used for temporary storage, for quicker access.
A blinking symbol on the screen that shows where any new text will next be entered.
A special program which enables a computer to work with a particular piece of hardware such as a printer.
Specialised hardware or software designed to prevent unauthorised access into or out of a computer / network.
A particular kind of lettering (e.g. Arial, Verdana, etc.)
A website that acts as a gateway or entry point to the internet (for example, Yahoo).
A program or tool such as Google that enables you to browse or surf the World Wide Web.
